text:
Hey, Guys,

I am new to HubSpot so I got some questions to ask.
Please,  spread out your knowledge on threads.

I am looking for HubSpot connector to trino or JDBC for connect to HubSpot database at the moment.

or any solutions to conenct and ETL HubSpot database by Pyspark.

Thanks.
Hello guys, I have some questions about my app's scope permissions, wonder what the right channel to ask would be?

Hi guys, perhaps someone can help me with my question: I'm building a HubSpot integration and was wondering if it's possible to get a *HubSpot dev account* with the `CRM Suite` to test my integration.

Would appreciate any help.

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
question - how long does it typically take y'all to scope a custom integration with HS from start to finish? (in weeks or days)
just trying to get a sense of how to realistically set expectations with leads
